intro: I am an Frontend Web Developer who works with React,NextJS and Vue.
I am currently a final year student in college who also loves listening audiobooks, learning languages and sketching when free.
plants: Here are my two plants which I am currently taking care of.
I like planting, because it really show how something so small can become so big over time.
sketch: I believe that coding is somewhere similar to sketching
It requires patience to create a detailed drawing, and more in depth you go the more details there are.
audioBooks: AudioBooks I am currently listening to:

Myprojects.title: Search Engine Application
Myprojects.description: Created a mobile responsive search engine with complete search functionalities by linking to Google Search API. Made the design more robust with the help of JIT Tailwind and is inspired by Google.Added pagination to results displayed using state management.

Myprojects.title: News AI Application
Myprojects.description: One of my unique builds, I created a voice-powered AI news application. The application is uses Alan AI studio for listening to user queries. The design is based on Material-UI framework.

Myprojects.title: Voice Powered Expense Tracker
Myprojects.description: I made a voice-powered Expense Tracker using Speechly API. The application uses Speechly API for voice recognition and responding voice commands for adding transactions.

Myprojects.title: Chat Application
Myprojects.description: An email-based chat application in NextJS with React, Styled-components, Firebase for persistence and Firebase Auth for authentication. The design is heavily inspired by WhatsApp's Desktop client.

Myprojects.title: Twitter Dev
Myprojects.description: In this project, I created a full stack social media application having design based on Twitter. The application can create, update and delete posts on real time.

Myprojects.title: Netflix Clone
Myprojects.description: Created with mobile-first principle designs an OTT Platform having authentication with the Firebase Auth and video playing functionality using ReactJS and Styled Components (reusable Compound Components). The design is heavily inspired by Netflix.

Myprojects.title: React Movie Search
Myprojects.description: One of my earlier projects, I created a React Movie Search Application which uses Movie Database API to get details of different movies.

Myprojects.title: Crypto World
Myprojects.description: In this project, I created a Crypto Currency Application. It displays economic statistics of different crytocurrencies.

Myprojects.title: Video Chatting App
Myprojects.description: I have been very interested in creating application with video chatting. It includes video chatting to different people through their IDs.

Myprojects.title: Fireblog
Myprojects.description: I created an application using VUEjs and Firebase. It is a blog posting web application which includes the function of adding ,removing ,updating posts.

Myprojects.title: ECommerce Store
Myprojects.description: Made an online e-commerce application using Commerce JS for all the business logic. It can purchase different items and store important financial information of clients.

Myprojects.title: React Typescript Quiz
Myprojects.description: I created React App with Typescript. It is a quiz game of 10 questions which works like Trivia.
